title: "Data Collection"
editor: visual
---

The data sets that were used for this study and their respective sources are as follows:

| **File Name**                                                                                        | Description                                                                                                | Source                                                                                                                                            |
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| education (School Directory and Information)                                                         | Provides information about primary schools, secondary schools and junior colleges.                         | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/school-directory-and-information)                                                                       |
| MP19 (Master Plan 2019 Subzone Boundary (No Sea))                                                    | Provides information about the Urban Redevelopment Authority's (URA) regions, planning areas and subzones. | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/master-plan-2019-subzone-boundary-no-sea)                                                               |
| POP2020 (Singapore Residents by Planning Area / Subzone, Single Year of Age and Sex, June 2011-2020) | Provides multiple years of population data by age group as at June 2020.                                   | [Department of Statistics (DOS), Singapore](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/find-data/search-by-theme/population/geographic-distribution/latest-data) |
